name: Loop Warrior: (un)defeatable
description:
This project was made as a task for the Game Design subject. 

At the moment, the game is only available in Portuguese (Brazil)

The game was made by: Carlos Gabriel Reinheimer, Eduarda Sorgetz Alves & Bernardo Rodrigo Horbach

Musics:

CymbalBird - Battle

Strobotone - Medieval Theme 01

SERGE QUADRADO - Medieval

Phil Crescenzo - Medieval Exchange

Maarten Schellekens - A Sad Day

Kai Nobuko - Calm Dub
